page.title: 13GHOSTS OF BATTLE ABBEY
page.content: THERE ARE MANY STORIES OF GHOSTS BEING SEEN AROUND BATTLE ABBEY.THE MOST FAMOUS IS PROBABLY THE COWLED MONK WHO LAID A CURSE ON THE OCCUPANTS AFTER THE DISSOLUTION,SAYING THAT THEY WOULD DIE BY FIRE OR WATER. THERE ARE OTHER REPORTS OF MONKS BEING SEEN IN THE GROUNDS AT NIGHT.A WHITE LADY HAUNTS THE GATE-HOUSE AND ON THE ANNIVERSARY OF THE BATTLE OF HASTINGS CRIES OF MEN AND HORSES CAN BE HEARD FROM THE BATTLEFIELD AND KING HAROLD HAS BEEN SEEN WITH AN ARROW IN HIS EYE.AT CHRISTMAS 1984 TWO GROUPS OF GIRLS SAW INDEPENDENTLY A WHITE FIGURE ON THE GALLERY IN THE ABBOT'S HALL WHICH THEN MOVED ACROSS TO THE ABBOT'S CHAPEL.NO LOGICAL EXPLANATION HAS BEEN FOUND FOR THIS.THERE ARE OTHER STORIES OF MYSTERIOUS FIGURES AND SHADOWS IN THE SCHOOL AT NIGHT,NOT ALL OF WHICH ARE IMAGINED.
